908420.name: We Happy Few - Soundtrack and Digital Goods Bundle
908420.description:
此原声带和数字好礼同捆包，内含《We Happy Few》官方原声带(.MP3和.FLAC 格式)，搭配其他数字好礼让你的生活充满乐趣：
  • 结合4K截图和概念艺术草图的墙纸
  • 手机墙纸
  • 内含游戏原声带剪辑和经典对话的铃声
  • 唱歌时可对照的歌词本！
原声带内含游戏中的歌曲，以及为游戏量身打造的男子乐团：装扮乐团，向60年代的摇摆乐致敬，以及为《We Happy Few》原声创作的曲子。装扮乐团简介如下：
  • Murray A. Lightburn - Lead Vocals, Guitar, Bass
  • Brad Barr - Lead Vocals, Guitar
  • Andrew Barr - Drums, Percussion, Backing Vocals
  • Patrick Watson - Lead Vocals, Keyboards
Tracks:
  • 1. Dead Of Winter by The Make Believes
  • 2. Out Of The Blue by The Make Believes
  • 3. La La La by The Make Believes
  • 4. Smiling Crime by The Make Believes
  • 5. Zombieland by The Make Believes
  • 6. When You're Gone by The Make Believes
  • 7. Georgie Joy by The Make Believes
  • 8. Wellington Wells Broadast Corporation by Nicolas Marquis
  • 9. Dead Chuffed by Nicolas Marquis
  • 10. House Of Curious Behaviors by Nicolas Marquis
  • 11. Lovely Day For It by Murray Lightburn
  • 12. Suspect On The Loose by Nicolas Marquis
  • 13. Parade District by Nicolas Marquis
  • 14. The Garden District by Nicolas Marquis
  • 15. Hamlyn, A Seaside Town by Nicolas Marquis
  • 16. Brassed Off by Nicolas Marquis
  • 17. Dead Chuffed - Dazed And Confused by Nicolas Marquis
  • 18. Everything Will Be As Right As Rain by Nicolas Marquis
  • 19. Joy And A Happy Face by Nicolas Marquis
  • 20. On Cloud Nine by Nicolas Marquis
  • 21. Enlightenment Is Found In Mushrooms by Nicolas Marquis
  • 22. Angry Mushrooms by Nicolas Marquis
  • 23. Wellington Wells Anthem by Nicolas Marquis
  • 24. Military Camp by Nicolas Marquis
  • 25. Jubilator Music by Nicolas Marquis
  • 26. The Bobby Song by Nicolas Marquis
  • 27. The Church Of Simon Says by Nicolas Marquis
  • 28. Notes Of Distraction by Nicolas Marquis
  • 29. Lift To The Executive Committee by Nicolas Marquis
  • 30. Suspicious At The Jumble Sale by Nicolas Marquis
  • 31. The Plague Shelter by Nicolas Marquis
  • 32. Are They Sleeping? By Nicolas Marquis
  • 33. Overdose and Crash by Nicolas Marquis
  • 34. Last Legs by Nicolas Marquis
  • 35. Victoria's Abdelazer by Henry Purcell Arranged by Nicolas Marquis
  • 36. Welcome To Wellington Wells by Nicolas Marquis
  • 37. Sunny Day by Nicolas Marquis
  • 38. Garden District Reprise by Nicolas Marquis
  • 39. Joy And A Happy Face Reprise by Nicolas Marquis
  • 40. Who's Up For Simon Says by Nicolas Marquis
  • 41. A Seaside Town Reprise by Nicolas Marquis
  • 42. Train Station by Nicolas Marquis
  • 43. The Ratholm Fog by Nicolas Marquis
  • 44. Sunny Day - Down And Out by Nicolas Marquis
  • 45. Department Of Science by Nicolas Marquis
  • 46. Ollie's Defense by Nicolas Marquis
  • 47. Fighting For Joy by Nicolas Marquis
  • 48. Arthur's Escape by Nicolas Marquis
